isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - REMOVE - CAB DOOR CHECK LINK

svcsubproc.title: Remove Front Cab Door Check Link on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models

step1.para:
Remove front cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If front cab door is equipped with electric windows and locks, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Windows and Locks on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. If front cab door is equipped with manual windows and locks, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Remove front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to
CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For removing front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 51 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove two hex nuts (Item 1) and remove the front cab door check link (Item 2) from the front cab door (Item 3).

figure.caption: Figure 51. Front Cab Door Check Link

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side front cab door check link.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Rear Cab Door Check Link on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models

step1.para:
Remove rear cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If crew cab rear door is equipped with electric windows and locks, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Windows and Locks on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. If crew cab rear door is equipped with manual windows and locks, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Remove crew cab rear door inner door panel water shield, refer to
CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For removing rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 52 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove two hex nuts (Item 1) and remove the crew cab rear door check link (Item 2) from the crew cab rear door (Item 3), driver side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 52. Crew Cab Rear Door Check Link

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. CREW CAB REAR DOOR CHECK LINK

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side crew cab rear door check link.
